(Simplified: 浃)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 夾 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 夾 [ jiā ] to support; to be wedged between
①溼透：汗流浹背。
②周匝：浹日(古代以干支爲“浹日”)。浹辰(稱自子至亥一週十二日爲“浹辰”)。
③深入，融洽：浹洽。
浹洽 [ jiā qià ]: to extend; to spread everywhere
(Simplified: 浃)

浹字的基本解释

浹
jiā
见“浃”。

浹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiā］
［《廣韻》子協切，入帖，精。］
“浃1”的繁体字。亦作“浃1”。
(1)遍及；满。
(2)通达。
(3)浸透；融合。
(4)融洽。
(5)切合。
(6)即浃日。十天。
(7)沾润。谓施予某种恩惠。
(8)谓得到恩惠。
[②]［xiá］
［《集韻》轄夾切，入洽，匣。］
“浃2”的繁体字。亦作“浃2”。
见“浹2渫”。

浹字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　浹； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页625第17
【唐韻】子協切【集韻】卽協切，?音?。【爾雅·釋言】徹也。【疏】謂潤澤浹洽，相霑徹也。【前漢·禮樂志】教化浹洽。　又周浹，猶周匝也。【荀子·君道篇】先王審禮，以旁皇周浹于天下。　又【左傳·宣九年】浹辰之閒，楚克三都。【註】浹辰，謂自子至亥，周匝十二日也。【楚語】近不過浹日。【註】浹日，謂從甲至癸也。　又通作挾。【周禮·天官】使萬民觀治象，挾日而斂之。　又【集韻】轄夾切，音洽。浹渫，水貌。【郭璞·江賦】長波浹渫。【註】浹渫，水滂溏也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiā］
["Guangyun" sub-associated cutting, entry, fine. ]
Traditional characters for "浃1". Also known as "浃1".
(1) All over; full.
(2) Accessibility.
(3) Soaking; fusion.
(4) Harmony.
(5) Appropriate.
(6) That is, Sunshine. Ten days.
(7) Wetting. It means to give some kind of favor.
(8) It means to get favors.
[②]［xiá］
["Ji Yun" administers clip cutting, entering into contact, and box. ]
"浃2" in traditional characters. Also known as "浃2".
See "浃2渫".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Shuizi Department】　浃; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 625 to 17
[Tang Yun] Zi Xie cut [Ji Yun] 卽 Xie cut, "yin?". 【Erya·Interpretation】Truya. [Sparse] It is said that it is moisturizing and harmonious, and it is also thoroughly connected. 【Former Han·Liyuezhi】Cultivating Chancha.　Zhou Zhou again, still Zhou Zaye. [Xunzi·Jun Dao Chapter] The first king's trial of rituals, the next to the emperor Zhou Xun in the world.　[Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Nine Years] Xun Chen's leisure, Chu Ke three capitals. [Note] Xunchen means that from Zi to Hai, Zhou Zha is also on the twelfth day. [Chu language] It's not nearly as long as the sun. [Note] Xunri means from Jia to Kui.　Through coercion again. [Zhou Li·Tian Guan] Make all people observe and treat the phenomenon, and take advantage of the sun.　[Jiyun] Administer clip cutting, sound harmony.浃渫, water appearance. 【Guo Pu·Jiang Fu】Chang Bo Xun Xun. 【Note】Xinxue, water is also flooded.
